General_Description: '''Red Skies''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta]] is slowly invading our nation. We need to push them back to their land."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Spartan [[brute]]s and [[Nation Leader|leaders]], and some Spartan [[ship]]s throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
